alert.note: Alert for Bamberg; Barnwell (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 10 at 6:11PM EDT until July 10 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central South Carolina, including the following counties, Bamberg, Barnwell and Orangeburg. * WHEN...Until 815 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 611 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Orangeburg, Bamberg, Denmark, Brookdale, Williston, Blackville, Edisto Gardens, Orangeburg County Airport, South Carolina State University, Claflin College, Barnwell State Park, North, Springfield, Hilda, Neeses, Norway, Rowesville, Olar, Elko and Cordova. - This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 146 and 159. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
